normal.1: Performs up to 3 consecutive shots with a bow.

charged.1: Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
charged.2: While aiming, Electro energy will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal high amounts of <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
charged.3: Ororon will also enter the Spiritspeaker state upon holding to aim, which will let him obtain the information and power within Nightspirit Graffiti and Nightspirit Sigils.

plunging.1: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Ororon manifests an ancient mystical technique from the Masters of the Night-Wind as a Spirit Oculus of midnight shade and throws it at the foe, dealing Nightsoul-aligned Electro DMG.
description.1: When other opponents are nearby, the Spirit Oculus will bounce between them, dealing Nightsoul-aligned <electro>Electro DMG</electro>. Each time Night's Tightrope is used, each opponent can only be selected as a target once.
description.2: After 3 bounces, or if there are no eligible targets left, the Oculus will disappear. 1 Oculus created by Ororon himself can exist at any one time.
description.4: "People always wish to foretell the future, but that might be because they have yet to discover that which they must do... Sorry, I'm saying complicated things again, I know..."

description.0: Ororon works an ancient ritual, dealing Nightsoul-aligned <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro>, summoning forth a Supersonic Oculus.
3: Continuously taunts nearby opponents and attracts attacks from them.
Continuously rotates and fires off sonic waves that deal Nightsoul-aligned <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
description.5: Those with sharp enough senses can hear the minute voices with which all things speak. That way, they will never lose their way â€” not even on long, lightless nights.

description.0: When a nearby party member triggers Nightsoul Burst, Ororon will gain 40 Nightsoul points. Within 15s after using his Elemental Skill, when nearby active characters deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> or <electro>Electro DMG</electro>, Ororon will gain 5 Nightsoul points, an effect that can occur every 0.3s, and can occur 10 times during this 15s duration.
description.2: Also, when nearby opponents take <electro>Electro-Charged</electro> reaction DMG or when nearby characters deal Nightsoul-aligned DMG, Ororon will consume 10 Nightsoul points (provided he has at least that amount), entering the Nightsoul's Blessing state and triggering the Hypersense effect: Deal Nightsoul-aligned <electro>Electro DMG</electro> based on 130% of Ororon's ATK to at most 4 nearby opponents. The aforementioned effect can trigger once every 1.8s.

description.0: After the Elemental Skill Night's Tightrope's Spirit Oculus hits an opponent, Ororon will gain the Aspect Sigil effect for 15s.
description.3: When nearby active party member deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> or <electro>Electro DMG</electro>, that character will restore 3 Energy. If Ororon is off-field, Ororon will also restore 3 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger 3 times per duration.

passive3.name: Night Realm's Gift: Flowing Fog, Spritely Shadows

description.0: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, he can use Nightsoul Transmission: Ororon. When the active character is currently in a movement mode caused by certain Talents, or at a certain height in the air, the following will trigger when switching to Ororon: Ororon will leap up high. Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your party.
description.2: Additionally, holding the jump button will cause Ororon to consume 75 Stamina and leap. In areas within Natlan where Phlogiston mechanics are present, Ororon will prioritize consuming 5 Phlogiston to leap to a height higher still.

description.0: The Elemental Skill Night's Tightrope's Spirit Oculus can bounce 2 additional times.
description.1: Additionally, after the Spirit Oculus hits an opponent, it will apply the Nighttide effect to them for 12s. Opponents affected by Nighttide take 60% increased DMG from Hypersense triggered by the Passive Talent, "Nightshade Synesthesia." Unlock the aforementioned Passive Talent to trigger this effect.

constellation2.name: King Bee of the Hidden Honeyed Wine

description.0: After using his Elemental Burst, Dark Voices Echo, Ororon will obtain the Spiritual Supersense effect for 9s.
description.3: During this time, every additional opponent hit by the Elemental Burst Dark Voices Echo or Supersonic Oculus will grant Ororon a further 12% Electro DMG Bonus. The maximum that can be gained this way is 60% Electro DMG Bonus.

description.0: Increases the Level of Dark Voices Echo by 3.

constellation4.name: As the Mysteries of the Night Wind

description.0: The Supersonic Oculus summoned by the Elemental Burst, Dark Voices Echo rotates 25% faster.
Increases the Level of Night's Tightrope by 3.
After triggering Hypersense through the Passive Talent, Nightshade Synesthesia, your current active character's ATK is increased by 10% for 9s. Max 3 stacks, each stack is counted independently.
description.1: Additionally, when you use the Elemental Burst Dark Voices Echo, you will trigger one instance of an effect equivalent to Hypersense, dealing 200% of its original DMG.
description.2: You must unlock the Passive Talent "Nightshade Synesthesia" first.
